job_title: Sr Java Engineer, Analytics (Streaming) with GCP

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field

jd:
From: UTTAM BARMAN, SONITALENTCORP uttam.barman@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: uttam.barman@sonitalentcorp.com Job Title : Sr Java Engineer, Analytics (Streaming) with GCP
Location : Mountain View, CA [Needs to be onsite for 1 week once in a quarter on your own expenses]
Job Type : Contract
only w2 candidates
Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Senior Java Engineer, Analytics with a focus on Streaming on GCP cloud to join our team. As a Senior Java Engineer, you will play a key role in designing, building, and maintaining our real-time analytics infrastructure. You will work closely with our data scientists, product managers, and other engineers to develop and deploy scalable, efficient, and reliable data pipelines.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
7+ years of experience in software engineering, with a focus on streaming data pipelines and analytics (in Recent project).
Strong programming skills in Java.
Experience with a public cloud provider, with a focus on GCP (in Recent project).
Strong experience with messaging/stream processing systems such as Google Cloud Pub/Sub, and Google Cloud DataFlow.
Experience with Apache Beam.
Experience with data warehousing and data lake technologies.
Strong understanding of data modeling, data governance, and data security.
Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to work independently and collaboratively.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Experience with machine learning and data science technologies is a plus.
Certification in GCP is required.
